name: aws-serverless-express-example
description: Example application for running a Node Express app on AWS Lambda using Amazon API Gateway.

scripts.invoke-lambda: aws --profile saml lambda invoke --function-name $npm_package_config_functionName --region $npm_package_config_region --payload file://api-gateway-event.json lambda-invoke-response.json && cat lambda-invoke-response.json
scripts.deploy: aws --profile saml cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged-sam.yaml --stack-name $npm_package_config_cloudFormationStackName --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region $npm_package_config_region
scripts.package-deploy: npm run package && npm run deploy
scripts.setup: npm install && (aws s3api get-bucket-location --bucket $npm_package_config_s3BucketName --region $npm_package_config_region || npm run create-bucket) && npm run package-deploy
scripts.win-invoke-lambda: aws --profile saml lambda invoke --function-name %npm_package_config_functionName% --region %npm_package_config_region% --payload file://api-gateway-event.json lambda-invoke-response.json && cat lambda-invoke-response.json
scripts.win-deploy: aws --profile saml cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged-sam.yaml --stack-name %npm_package_config_cloudFormationStackName% --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region %npm_package_config_region%
scripts.win-package-deploy: npm run win-package && npm run win-deploy
scripts.win-setup: npm install && (aws s3api get-bucket-location --bucket %npm_package_config_s3BucketName% --region %npm_package_config_region% || npm run win-create-bucket) && npm run win-package-deploy
